item.title: Morgan Freeman's fans jump in to defend, as veteran star gets trolled for his opening act in FIFA World Cup Qatar
item.description: Morgan Freeman’s fans jump in to defend, as veteran star gets trolled for his opening act in FIFA World Cup Qatar Amid massive trolling for Morgan's participation in Qatar, netizens applaud the veteran actor's unseen speech with Ghanim al-Muftah.
